location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Elphinston, Auditor for Civil Accounts at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Elphinston, Auditor for Civil Accounts at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, forwarding a copy of the resolutions on the audit of Bruce's disbursements from May to July 1808 (resolutions not enclosed).
